---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
indexes <- createDataPartition(iris$Species, times = 1, p = 0.08, list = FALSE)
mini_iris <- iris[indexes,]
```


```{r}
set.seed(123)
mini_iris <- as.data.frame(mini_iris)
fit <- train(x =  mini_iris[,-5],
      y = mini_iris[,5],
      data = mini_iris,
      method = rknn,
      trControl = fitControl)
```

```{r}
data <- fit$modelInfo$grid()
kable(data) %>%
  kable_styling("striped", full_width = F) %>%
  row_spec(which(data$k == 3), bold = T, color = "black", background = "#fdfd96")
```
